events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest and submitting your resume.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering team as the candidateâ€™s experience matches the software developer role requirements.
A recruiter specializing in engineering positions has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
The initial phone screening was successfully completed, covering your background in software development and your technical skills.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the technical interview. We appreciate your enthusiasm for the role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 2 PM UTC. Please review the preparation materials shared via email.
